recipe.title: Radicchio Salad with Spanish Blue Cheese and Peppered Almonds
ingredients: 1 head butter lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
1 head radicchio, torn into bite-size pieces
5 tablespoons almond oil or olive oil
instructions: Combine lettuce, radicchio and cheese in large bowl. Pour vinegar into small bowl. Gradually whisk in oil. Toss lettuce mixture with vinaigrette. Season salad with salt and pepper. Sprinkle Peppered Almonds over and serve immediately.
